website_summaries.verdict: This gorgeous, hand-carved cradle is perfect for any nursery. An heirloom piece, this cradle is designed with the idea that it will be passed down for generations.
pros: Stoppers prevent it from rocking if desired
Perfect for a baby boy or girl
Constructed from cherry wood with beautiful curves and details, the Ga Ga Cradle is an elegant choice
cons: The mattress pad is very thin, and some have said that theirs had some marks in the wood when it arrived

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL Elegant & Classy Cradle!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my cradle! So thrilled to have found it on Amazon. I searched high and low for an elegant, classy looking cradle. I am NOT fond of the standard bassinets found on every well-known baby site and I definitely do NOT like the bassinets on wheels. I wanted the look of a crib without the size. This fit the bill perfectly and it looks awesome in my bedroom. Every family member who's seen it loves it. It's definitely an heirloom type of piece and could definitely be passed down from family member to family member. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fashionista34

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cradle
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! It's nice and large and classic looking. I did buy an additional mattress because the one it comes with is too thin. Sturdy and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Lt

customer_reviews.title: this is a gorgeous cradle but it does not stay ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a gorgeous cradle but it does not stay level. if ur baby moves a little bit to one side the whole cradle tilts to that side and the locks don't work. its a shame bec its so pretty
customer_reviews.author: LYH

customer_reviews.title: however be aware it is larger than most cradle sheets that are easily found.
customer_reviews.text: This cradle is lovely, however be aware it is larger than most cradle sheets that are easily found.
customer_reviews.author: No complaints

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: After reading several pros and cons I went along and ordered this. It's not hard to put together and it is very sturdy and beautifully made. I'm 8 months pregnant an put it together in 10 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but totally unstable
customer_reviews.text: The leg "locks" still let it rock and just leans to one side when the baby is in it. Without locking the legs, you might as well just roll the baby out of it. But it sure is a pretty cradle
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Sica

customer_reviews.title: Also,the baby sleeps very well!
customer_reviews.text: I like it because you know that your baby îs safe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my first Baby, I'm keeping it near my bed, good looking, easy to assemble...but moms need to keep in mind its more for new born (0-6 months max)
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to put together and it is solid
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together and it is solid. We bought this as a warehouse deal so the so it's not a surprise to us the the finish isn't perfect. We are pleased with what we got at the LOW price we paid. the imperfections we can fix.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Its a beautiful cradle and great quality too
customer_reviews.text: God this as a shower gift! Its a beautiful cradle and great quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: I love the design and the quality of our purchase
customer_reviews.text: We received so many compliments over my son's cradle. I love the design and the quality of our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing got here earlier than expected but it had some damage done to it as far as missing paint and dents in the wood it looks beautiful but would've been better of it wasn't beat up
customer_reviews.author: alfonso perez

customer_reviews.title: Orbelle cradle
customer_reviews.text: This cradle was exactly as expected, other than the color, as others have noted. It is more of a bright white than "French white". It happens to work just fine in the nursery but I wish the description could be more accurate. I don't know how you could get any more stark white. Anyway, it seems to be of great quality and I'm happy overall. The cradle we received happened to fit together well and my husband had no problems putting it together. (previous reviewers mentioned the bottom not fitting) We haven't used it yet but I'm sure we will be happy to have it once she arrives.
customer_reviews.author: L. Helm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It only has a scratch in one of the legs but nothing out of this world
customer_reviews.author: ybmik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: A great cradle! Perfect height and overall great quality. I would recommend this cradle anytime!
customer_reviews.author: TDO

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together,all pieces fit perfectly I was concerned because as I was reading comments, someone else had reviewed that parts didn't fit. I was lucky I guess
customer_reviews.author: Jean Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Wish the stoppers worked a little better for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Wish the stoppers worked a little better for stabilizing when not rocking. But very good quality wood and design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cradle
customer_reviews.text: This cradle is very beautiful and despite some of the bad reviews I read we had no problem putting it together. Our son isn't here yet but I'm sure it will more than suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lomeli

customer_reviews.title: It did come with a chunk out of it but ...
customer_reviews.text: It did come with a chunk out of it but I am working with them now to get it resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: I love this bassinet, it’s so beautiful. I didn’t have any issues putting it together like other reviewers said and there were no flaws in the paint at all. The mattress is very thin and doesn’t seem very comfortable but I’m still giving 5 stars because I didn’t buy it for the mattress and planned on replacing it anyways.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: perfect for a baby boy or baby girl. built it in 20 minutes the reviewers complaining that the board doesn't fit really its like 2 centimeters bigger if it really bothers you just sand it down or cut it. it doesn't make a difference the baby is still safe in the cradle. its so beautiful though highly recommended :) great quality for price. though babys not here yet and hasn't slept it in its perfect to me.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: cute but color is different and came with a lot of defects
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute cradle but the picture looks like it's a cream color and it's actually stark white. Also, it came with some scratches and cracks and the bottom board too big, so it won't come together right. I have tried to email them 3 times and called and left a message and haven't heard anything. If they had a more responsive customer service I would give this more stars, but right now, I would say try somebody else. I may try to return it if i don't hear back from them soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Lyon

customer_reviews.title: poor
customer_reviews.text: I thought the tools were not well fitting. Horrible scratches on side of unit. Doesn't balance well. I've never written a bad review on Amazon before but this was a pretty bad experience. I only know my 4 day old can't tell the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not safe! Horrible product and even worse customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! Do not buy! The legs snapped off after a couple of uses. Thank Goodness baby was not injured. Worst of all their customer service is horrible. I had emailed and never heard a response, finally I was able to reach someone and she was extremely rude and unprofessional. Told me it was not her problem and to call the owner. You would think they would demonstrate more compassion considering their product could have injured my infant.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah smith

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed made cheap the legs broke good thing the baby was not in it! only had it for 2 Weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

product_meta.title: Orbelle Trading Ga Ga Cradle, French White
product_meta.description: Color:French WhiteThe Orbelle Ga Cradle is a Beautiful Hand Carved Cradle. This Heirloom Quality Cradle will be part of your family for generations. We have designed Stoppers to prevent the Cradle from Rocking. This Cradle is Constructed of Solid Wood, with Great Detailed Curves. Includes a Completely Fitted Mattress. Includes all Tools for Easy Assembly.Orbelle Baby and Teen Furniture started in Brooklyn in 1991. In the beginning of 2006 they moved their location to Long Island into a bigger warehouse so that they can keep a larger inventory in order to speed up our deliveries. We can ship items in our warehouse to their customers within 72 hours. They are committed to quality and serving their customers. Since their doors first opened, Orbelle Baby and Teen Furniture has been a family owned and operated business. Orbelle Baby and Teen Furniture is a leading company of kids convertible beds in the country with exclusive designs and colors.
feature_bullets: Heirloom quality cradle will be part of your family for generations
Stoppers to prevent the cradle from rocking
Cradle is constructed of solid wood
Includes all tools for easy assembly

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
